author: Hannah Karp
title: Sony Entertainment CEO Confirms Music Publishing Talks
text:
Sony Corp. and the estate of Michael Jackson have begun a process paving the way for either party to buy out the otherâ€™s half of their jointly owned music publishing company, Sony/ATV Music Publishing, according to an internal memo sent to Sony employees Thursday morning.
The memo confirmed an earlier report by The Wall Street Journal that Sony... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
